title: I'm Ready to Say I'm Sorry
description:
Lucas thought he and his Godmother would be closer when he moved nearby, but their relationship is strained primarily by his disregard for her beliefs and values. - Dr. Laura: "You don't have to like the rules of a person's home, but you do need to respect them."

Does someone you love have wildly different values from your own? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
